message.content:
After tracing all given relationships, the only ancestors of Joshua are:
Ryan → Eric → David → Melissa → Wayne → Billy → Abigail → Mason → Stephen → Sandra  

The only ancestors of Laura are:
Timothy → Gary → Jose → Aaron → Jack → Brittany → Isabella → George → Justin → Carl → Rachel → Randy → Samuel  

These two lines never intersect, there is no path from Joshua to Laura (or vice‑versa), and there is no individual who is a descendant of both. Hence none of the first four statements is true.

<ANSWER>5</ANSWER>
